title: Ticket #219: Negotiator leaks machines when startd rejects match
description:
I see the negotiator consistently leaking machines when the startd rejects a match. In this case, a user has 11 machines:

condor_status -run | grep -c rosin 11

But the negotiator, over many cycles, thinks he has 28:

2/17 16:40:35 CustomerName=Customer.rosin@cs.wisc.edu , Old Priority=186.337 , New Priority=185.950 , ResourcesUsed=28
check_ins: 2021-Sep-30 12:52   Check-in [64535]: Merged [64532], Merge pull request #219 from htcondor/V9_0-HTCONDOR-760-branch HTCONDOR-760 fix for segfault in gpu discovery MIG detection Committer: GitHub (By Todd L Miller )
creator: gthain
